head.citation-title: Uncertainty principle in random quaternion domains
head.abstracts: © 2023 Elsevier Inc.In this paper, we establish Donoho and Stark's uncertainty principle in the framework of quaternionic analysis for random signals, where a probability measure is involved in our generalizations. In particular, the results are given for the right-sided and the two-sided quaternion Fourier transform, respectively. In the last section we will apply the obtained results in recovery problem for random signals. Several numerical experiments are used to demonstrate the performance of the proposed methods.

organization.$: Macau University of Science and Technology
